Actions.Name: Clean Address
Actions.Description: Formats, verifies and corrects a given address into a full formatted address.

Actions.Name: Get Full Address
Actions.Description: Searches for an addresses based on input data such as building number and postcode

Actions.Name: CTPS Check
Actions.Description: Checks if a telephone number is registered on the CTPS or not.

Actions.Name: TPS Check
Actions.Description: Checks if a telephone number is registered on the TPS or not.

Actions.Name: Check Usable Name
Actions.Description: Using this action, you can check if a name is a real usable name or whether it is salacious, random or blank.

Actions.Name: Validate Bank Account Information
Actions.Description: Check if a sort code and bank account number are valid.

Actions.Name: Validate Email Address
Actions.Description: Checks to see if an inputted email address is valid to receive email

Actions.Name: Validate Telephone Number
Actions.Description: Checks to see if an inputted email address is valid to receive email
